apps.name: Numworks Calculator
apps.summary: The Numworks Calculator emulator for AnuraOS
apps.desc: The Numworks Emulator is a software application that allows you to run Numworks calculators on your computer. It is a great way to learn how to use Numworks calculators, or to simply play around with them. The emulator is very easy to use, and it comes with a variety of features that make it a great tool for learning.
